file.or.folder.name: 1. Folder description
collumn.name: NA
description: This folder contains all data files.

file.or.folder.name: B_W_circle_areaxx.csv
collumn.name: NA
description: This file contains the area of black and white in the field of view of a starfish when approaching a black and white circle.

file.or.folder.name: B_W_circle_areaxx.csv
collumn.name: distance
description: Distance to the stimulus in cm

file.or.folder.name: Climate_Lizard_Island.csv
collumn.name: NA
description: Climate information on Lizard Island from AIMS

file.or.folder.name: Coral reef contrastxx.csv
collumn.name: NA
description: This file contrast measurements done at Lizard Island.

file.or.folder.name: Coral reef contrastxx.csv
collumn.name: location
description: Locations on Lizard Island. A - Small coral bommie north of south island. In the shallow part of the reef. B - Southeast side of horse shoe reef

file.or.folder.name: Coral reef contrastxx.csv
collumn.name: mean
description: mean grey value in selected area

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: NA
description: This file contains the headings and timing of all behaviour experiments done at AIMS with the behavioural arena

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: order
description: number indicating the order of execution

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: stimulus.direction
description: Location of stimulus in the arena. Five stimulus locations were used

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: stimulus.name
description: final name used for stimulus. Remove indicates removal of measurement

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: batch
description: delivery date for batches of starfish

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: used.before
description: indicates if animal was used before

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: initial.heading
description: initial heading of locomotion in degrees

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: final.heading
description: final heading (where animal touched arena wall)

file.or.folder.name: COTS data AIMSxx.csv
collumn.name: touch
description: indicates which part of the stimulus the animal touched. Only applies to square stimuli

file.or.folder.name: Lagoon_blue_transmittance.txt
collumn.name: NA
description: This file contains the spectral data for the blue filter

file.or.folder.name: relative_sensitivityxx.csv
collumn.name: NA
description: Relative sensitivity values for crown-of-thorns starfish eyes, from petie(2016) published in Coral Reefs.

file.or.folder.name: Trackingxx.csv
collumn.name: NA
description: This file contains the coordinates of the tracks for the biggest stimulus and the control experiment for the “black circle on a white background” experiment.

file.or.folder.name: Trackingxx.csv
collumn.name: stimulus
description: stimulus type. Same as stimulus.name in “COTS data AIMS” file.

file.or.folder.name: Trackingxx.csv
collumn.name: type
description: indicates type of input. “centre” centre of arena. “stimulus” location of stimulus. “track” coordinates of the track.

file.or.folder.name: Trackingxx.csv
collumn.name: x.cor
description: correction for x coordinates. Sometimes the camera was moved during the recording. Other times the file was too big to load normally and the size was halved.
